archimate:DataObject.name: Currency
archimate:DataObject.documentation: Represent the currency in reality. Currency uses 1 or more CurrencyUnits. For example; Currency (code=CNY; symbol= ï¿¥) use three CurrencyUnits (Yuan; Jiao; Fen). Currency is associated to CurrencyExchangeRate with CurrencyUsedAsSource and CurrencyUsedAsDestination. Currency can be used in different Countrys.
